elements.name: WixUI_Advanced
elements.description: Complete UI with install scope choice (per-user/per-machine), feature selection, and directory browse. Best for complex installers.

elements.name: WixUI_FeatureTree
elements.description: UI with feature tree for selecting which features to install. Shows hierarchical feature structure.

elements.name: WixUI_InstallDir
elements.description: Simple UI that allows users to select installation directory. Good for single-directory installs.

elements.name: WixUI_Minimal
elements.description: Minimal UI with just welcome and license dialogs. Fastest installation experience.

elements.name: WixUI_Mondo
elements.description: Full-featured UI with Complete/Custom/Typical setup types. Most comprehensive built-in UI.

elements.name: WixUI_Common
elements.description: Common dialog resources shared by all WixUI variants. Automatically included.

elements.name: WixUI_ErrorProgressText
elements.description: Progress and error dialog customization. Use with other WixUI sets.

elements.name: UIRef
elements.description: References a WixUI dialog set by Id. Use to include a built-in UI library.

elements.name: UI
elements.description: Container for custom UI elements. Child of Package element.

elements.name: Dialog
elements.description: Defines a dialog window. Contains Control elements for UI components.

elements.name: DialogRef
elements.description: References a dialog defined elsewhere. Used to include dialogs from libraries.

elements.name: Control
elements.description: UI control within a dialog. Types include Text, PushButton, CheckBox, Edit, etc.

elements.name: TextStyle
elements.description: Defines font styling for dialog text. Specifies face name, size, and attributes.

elements.name: Billboard
elements.description: Large image displayed during file copying. Shows progress information.

elements.name: BillboardAction
elements.description: Associates a billboard with an action for display timing.

elements.name: ProgressText
elements.description: Custom text shown during specific actions in the progress dialog.

elements.name: Error
elements.description: Custom error message for a specific error code.

elements.name: UIText
elements.description: Localizable UI string for controls and dialogs.

elements.name: Publish
elements.description: Associates a control event with a control. Triggers actions on user interaction.

elements.name: Subscribe
elements.description: Subscribes a control to receive events from other controls.

elements.name: Condition
elements.description: Conditional expression that affects control state or visibility.

elements.name: ListItem
elements.description: Item in a ListBox or ComboBox control.

elements.name: RadioButton
elements.description: Radio button option within a RadioButtonGroup.

elements.name: RadioButtonGroup
elements.description: Group of mutually exclusive radio buttons.
